scripts.dev: concurrently "[ -d hardhat ] && cd ./hardhat && npx hardhat node && cd .." "[ -d frontend ] && cd ./frontend && yarn dev && yarn dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "[ -d hardhat ] && cd ./hardhat yarn typechain && cd .." "[ -d frontend ] && cd ./frontend && yarn build"
scripts.installdeps: concurrently "[ -d frontend ] && cd frontend && yarn install" "[ -d hardhat ] && cd hardhat && yarn install"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "[ -d frontend ] && cd frontend && yarn install" "[ -d hardhat ] && cd hardhat && yarn install" "find . -type f -name .example.env -execdir mv {} .env ';'"
